flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=27>>27 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 27 bags = <<48-27=21>>21 bags for $22 each
21 bags were sold for 21 bags x $22/bag = $<<21*22=642>>642
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $642 = $<<306+250+642=1198>>1198
The salesman made $1198 - $576 = $<<1198-576=622>>622 in profit.
#### 622

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 462, not 642. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
